TextView.android:text: To test the IVS Karaoke sample app end-to-end you need two Android phones

- From device A open Karaoke with Real-time IVS (Stage) 
 
 - Play Music 
 
 - Start Streaming 
 
 - From Device B open Real-Time IVS Listener 
 
 - Start Listening
As the IVS session is recorded, you can hear the voice effects locally as well. When your Stop Streaming you can Play Recording to hear your recorded session.
If the volume of voice is low, please try singing into top bottom or the top microphone of the device
You can use your own IVS Stage tokens as well for both Publisher and Listener in Settings
